attributes.action: Petition to Labour Not to sign the EU Treaty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tony Blair and Labour want to sell the UK down the river and there will be no British way of life,No power - No friends, No Voice, NO Votes, No Say Just to be told what to do.
You have voted Labour in but who are they working for.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
